duties_responsibilities.duty: Curate and plan a diverse menu for serving food to customers on Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Fridays, as well as for catering events and special occasions.
Oversee the food preparation and kitchen operations, ensuring high quality and timely service.
Manage the catering services, including menu planning, food preparation, and delivery for events and special occasions.
Maintain and manage kitchen inventory, ensuring proper stock levels and minimizing food wastage.
Enforce food safety standards and procedures, conducting regular inspections and training the kitchen staff on best practices.
Lead and manage the kitchen team, providing guidance, training, and support for smooth operations and high-quality service.

education_certification.credential: Culinary degree or equivalent certification (Bachelor's preferred)
